item.title: Best quality of upwork clients
item.description: Upwork is a largest freelancing marketplace. Upwork offers wide range of jobs starting from $5. You can find clients from different part of the world , Freelancers greeting from different countries. We can say upwork is like a summation with all kind of people. So it is difficult to check the authenticity of people or client. As freelancer you dont know who is behind the clients id . What kinda human is he.

item.title: I am a Freelancer This does not mean i will work for free
item.description: Yes I am a freelancer, Yes i work from home, Yes i work hard to make money but some people unnecessary ask for extra work , some people ask for free courses , some people ask for free stuffs. I am a freelancer but this does not mean i will work for free. I have bills just like you. I pay hefty rent , I pay for internet , I pay for themes .
